name: biothings_client
description: Client for interfacing with Biothings APIs

scripts.minify: browserify client.js -x axios -x extend --standalone biothings_client -o dist/biothings_client.js & node -e "require('node-minify').minify({compressor: 'gcc', input: 'dist/biothings_client.js', output: 'dist/biothings_client.min.js'})"

author: Ben Abraham
